DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study : To assess effect wear custom orthotics oppose placebo foot insert duration chiropractic correction spinal fixation muscle imbalance use applied kinesiology technique .
DOC.brief_title: Duration Spinal Manipulation Effects Influenced Orthotics
DOC.detailed_description: Participants chronic low back pain great one month duration randomize receive custom foot orthotics placebo flat insert . Both group receive chiropractic treatment 5 time course 4 week follow receipt orthotics . Subjects treat doctor blind insert type . Patients report present , average , best bad pain visit , complete Roland-Morris questionnaire . Secondary outcome measure number fixate vertebral level identify motion palpation challenge number muscle test grade 4 list 5 muscle test bilaterally treatment .
DOC.criteria: Current low back pain episode present one month No change past month prescription medication affect musculoskeletal pain Able speak understand English adequately complete study form Score RolandMorris questionnaire 7.5 high Average score Chiropractic pain Index ( Now , Average , Worst scale Quadruple VAS pain scale ) 4 high . Use foot orthotics within past 12 month Previous lumbar spine surgery Ongoing treatment low back pain health care provider stable prescription medication affect musculoskeletal pain . Clinically significant chronic inflammatory spinal arthritis Severe osteoporosis spinal manipulation contraindicate Spinal pathology fracture Progressive neurologic deficit due nerve root spinal cord compression , include symptoms/signs cauda equina syndrome History bleeding disorder Known arterial aneurysm Pending/current litigation pertain back pain , include worker compensation claim Current pregnancy Lack mean contact might preclude successful completion study requirement Does speak , read understand English extent would affect subject 's capacity participate inform consent
